successes.title: Nava: A Revolutionary Filtering Water Bottle
successes.description: Nava makes ordinary tap water taste great by filtering as you sip. Finally—a stylish, convenient and fun alternative to bottled water.

Pledges.description:
I WAS THERE! 
 Be a part of this important project and get an inside look at the process: receive updates on production and be the first to know when Nava comes to market.

GUERILLA MARKETING PACKAGE.  
 Receive four official KOR ocean-drop logo stickers and share our mission to "celebrate and treasure water" because it's the one thing that connects us all.

EXTRA FILTERS. You asked for it, and we deliver!
Pledge $10.00 and we will give you two filter packs (two filters per pack) giving you an extra one year supply of filters at half off our MSRP of $10.95 per pack! 
US Shipping included.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL. 
One Nava bottle in the color of your choice guaranteed from first run production (white/blue, black/red, or black/blue). Includes first filter. Early bird special pricing limited to first 100 pledges.  US shipping included.

THE MESA. Think of this as a filter-less version of the Nava. Or, the worlds coolest sports bottle. Exactly the same as Nava except  1) doesn’t include a filter; 2) has a different straw, designed from the ground up for a sleek appearance a wonderful, thirst-quenching flow of water. One "Mesa" bottle in the color of your choice guaranteed from our first production run (white/blue, black/red, or black/blue). DOES NOT USE A FILTER. US shipping included.

THE STANDARD.
One Nava bottle in the color of your choice guaranteed from our first production run (white/blue, black/red, or black/blue). Includes first filter. US shipping included.
THE STANDARD. One Nava bottle in the color of your choice guaranteed from our first production run (white/blue, black/red, or black/blue). Includes first filter. US shipping included.

WATER ADVOCATE. 
Two KOR Nava bottles in different colors, each with a 12 month filter supply and subscription reminder service (we'll remind you when to change your filter). Choose a combination of white/blue + black/blue, white/blue + black/red, or black/blue + black/red.  US shipping included.

WATER ADVOCATE. Two KOR Nava bottles in different colors, each with a 12 month filter supply and subscription reminder service (we'll remind you when to change your filter). Choose a combination of white/blue + black/blue, white/blue + black/red, or black/blue + black/red. US shipping included.

BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND -- WATER ADVOCATE. Two KOR Nava bottles in different colors, each with a 12 month filter supply and subscription reminder service (we'll remind you when to change your filter). Choose a combination of white/blue + black/blue, white/blue + black/red, or black/blue + black/red. US shipping included.

BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND -- WATER ADVOCATE. Two KOR Nava bottles in different colors, each with a 12 month filter supply and subscription reminder service (we'll remind you when to change your filter). Choose a combination of white/blue + black/blue, white/blue + black/red, or black/blue + black/red. US shipping included.

*CANADA ONLY* WATER ADVOCATE. Two KOR Nava bottles in different colors, each with a 12 month filter supply and subscription reminder service (we'll remind you when to change your filter). Choose a combination of white/blue + black/blue, white/blue + black/red, or black/blue + black/red. *CANADA SHIPPING INCLUDED*.

THE PURITY PACKAGE. One Nava bottle in the color of your choice, plus a five year (yeah, that's right, 5 years!) filter supply and subscription reminder service (we'll remind you when to change your filter).  US shipping included.

SUPER WATER ADVOCATE. Two KOR Nava bottles in different colors with a 2 year filter supply for each bottle. Each bottle receives both a filtered and sports straw. Choose between white/blue + black/blue, white/blue + black/red, or black/blue + black/red.

THE PERFECT SET. 3 KOR Nava bottles in different colors with a unified, LIMITED EDITION printed design (300 sets for Kickstarters only). Each bottle comes with a 2 year filter supply and both a filtered and sports straw. INCLUDES white/blue + black/blue + black/red bottles. US Shipping Included. BEST VALUE

VIP ONE OF A KIND SPECIAL. One Nava bottle, in the color of your choice (white/blue, black/blue, or black/red), custom-printed with your own design (up the three color printing, one-side of bottle).  You'll also receive a ten year filter supply and subscription reminder service (we'll remind you when to change your filter) + a KOR Water official "Ocean Drop" logo T-shirt (choose unisex size S - XXL).  US shipping included.
